text: William Thickness (died c. 1403), of Newcastle-under-Lyme, Staffordshire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Newcastle-under-Lyme in 1378, January 1380, October 1382, April 1384, February 1388 and September 1388. He was Mayor of Newcastle-under-Lyme in 1372–73, 1379–1381, 1382–1384, 1385–86, 1387–88, 1395–96 and 1399–1400.http://historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1386-1421/member/thickness- william-1403 ==References== Category:14th-century births Category:1403 deaths Category:English MPs 1378 Category:Members of the Parliament of England for Newcastle-under-Lyme Category:English MPs January 1380 Category:English MPs October 1382 Category:English MPs April 1384 Category:English MPs February 1388 Category:English MPs September 1388
title: William Thickness
